headline: Beta Bionics Announces Agreement with Abbott to Integrate the iLet Bionic Pancreas with Abbott’s Future Dual Glucose-Ketone Sensor
summary: IRVINE, Calif., June 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Beta Bionics, Inc., a pioneering leader in the development of advanced diabetes management solutions, announced its intention to integrate its iLet Bionic Pancreas automated insulin delivery (AID) system with Abbott's future dual glucose-ketone sensor in the U.S. The iLet represents a significant advancement in diabetes care as the first and only AID system that makes 100% of insulin dosing decisions automatically.
